attributes.title: HORRIFIC!!
attributes.review:
When I downloaded this app, it made my pet worm gag all over the sofa! Also, it made my fridge run away. Now I can’t have my chicken tenders :c. WORST APP EVER! DONT GET IT!

also,
trump is a therapist ✨💫🧚‍♂️ except the letters, “the” are silent. 💅🏽🧚🏽‍♀️✨

attributes.title: terrible app
attributes.review: this app had not only crashed my phone but made me realize that i need to delete the app immediately unless trump gives us and drops the whole ban tik tok thing you cannot take our flavored juul pods and tik tok away from us gen z will revolt and we will not stop. also trump stop being racist and homophobic😘😘

attributes.title: Horrible, just horrendous

attributes.title: THE WORST APP I HAVE EVER HAD
attributes.review: If I could get rid of ANY APP on the App Store this would be it! The information on this app is trash and not goood! I hope we never have to see this app again!!!!!!!!

attributes.title: Horrible app do you not download
attributes.review: So befor I had had the app I was with my pet chicken nugget and  I downloaded the app and my chicken nugget and it was gone! So do not download the app

attributes.title: Nope
attributes.review: This app is garbage I was just trying to ride my magical dragon with my pet T-Rex and this app completely ruined it now I’m stuck sitting at home with my floating dog eating chips

attributes.title: Disappointment
attributes.review: Highly excited until I opened the app. It was a disappointment.

attributes.title: Why
attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible, no point in it. Also we gotta stop letting horrible people like him run stuff 😤

attributes.title: UGH IM SO MAD
attributes.review: This app literally made all of my friends HATE me. Right as I downloaded it they were all like “EWWWW YOU LIKE TRUMP???” And i know that they have a valid reason to say that because honestly trump is kinda gross. BUT I AM SO DISSOLVED WITH THIS APP. I WILL NOT BE VOTING TRUMP THIS NOVEMBER. Trump 2020 in a grave❤️

attributes.title: This app is horrendous
attributes.review: The app shows this hideous orange man and of his little minions would not recommend to anyone under the age of 150 please do no get it it’s the worst gave me nightmares
